long_description: These top-grade, odor-fighting Smartwool(R) light hiking socks stay soft and maintain excellent fit even after seasons of use. SmartWool(R) socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Made with merino wool and nylon to absorb and wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and cool in summer, warm in winter. Lycra(R) spandex ribbing in upper keeps sock in place; arch brace is knit with Lycra(R) spandex for added support and comfort. Light-density terry-loop padding provides a soft, cushioned fit for comfort on the trail. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: These top-grade, odor-fighting Smartwool(R) light hiking socks stay soft and maintain excellent fit even after seasons of use.
